languages.text: "Достаточно убить нескольких, чтобы многие лишились опоры. Дай ткачам принести смерть видным зачинщикам, и прочие устрашатся. Откроются для удара".
"It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."
languages.original_text: "Достаточно убить нескольких, чтобы многие лишились опоры. Дай ткачам принести смерть видным зачинщикам, и прочие устрашатся. Откроются для удара".

traits.locale_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the weavers bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."
"It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the weavers bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

"It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

languages.text: "Es reicht, einige zu töten, damit viele den Halt verlieren. Die Spinner sollen die bekannten Anstifter töten, um den Rest einzuschüchtern. Dann sind sie reif für einen Angriff."
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

traits.locale_text: "Es reicht, einige zu töten, damit viele den Halt verlieren. Die Spinner sollen die bekannten Anstifter töten, um den Rest einzuschüchtern. Dann sind sie reif für einen Angriff."

languages.text: « Il suffit de tuer quelques cibles bien choisies pour déstabiliser le gros des troupes. Que les tisseurs éliminent les instigateurs, et les autres, gagnés par la peur, prêteront le flanc à une attaque. »
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

traits.locale_text: « Il suffit de tuer quelques cibles bien choisies pour déstabiliser le gros des troupes. Que les tisseurs éliminent les instigateurs, et les autres, gagnés par la peur, prêteront le flanc à une attaque. »

languages.text: «Basta matar a unos pocos para que la mayoría pierda la compostura. Que los tejedores traigan muerte a los principales instigadores y el resto será presa del miedo. Quedarán expuestos a un ataque».
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

traits.locale_text: «Basta matar a unos pocos para que la mayoría pierda la compostura. Que los tejedores traigan muerte a los principales instigadores y el resto será presa del miedo. Quedarán expuestos a un ataque».

languages.text: 「数人を殺すだけで、大勢の足並みを乱すことができる。スピナーが目主要な扇動者に死をもたらすことで、残りの連中は怯むだろう。そうすれば彼らは攻撃に無防備になる」
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

traits.locale_text: 「数人を殺すだけで、大勢の足並みを乱すことができる。スピナーが目主要な扇動者に死をもたらすことで、残りの連中は怯むだろう。そうすれば彼らは攻撃に無防備になる」

languages.text: “只要杀死一小部分人，就足以让绝大部分人心生动摇。让织网者杀死那些煽动民众的人吧，这样一来，剩下的人就会陷入恐慌，变得不堪一击。”
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."

traits.locale_text: “只要杀死一小部分人，就足以让绝大部分人心生动摇。让织网者杀死那些煽动民众的人吧，这样一来，剩下的人就会陷入恐慌，变得不堪一击。”

languages.text: "Birçoğunun ayağını kaydırmak için birkaçını öldürmek yeterli olur. Dokurların önde gelen kışkırtıcıları ölümlerine kavuşturmasına müsaade edilirse kalanların gözü korkacaktır. Saldırıya açık hâle geleceklerdir."
languages.original_text: "It is enough to kill a few to make the many lose their footing. Let the spinners bring death to the prominent instigators, and the rest will be intimidated. They will open themselves to an attack."
